INDEX.title: Mobile Massage in the Comfort of Your Home
INDEX.text: Discover the power of relaxation in the comfort of your home in Berlin.

HOWWORK.title: How Does Your Massage Experience Work?

text.schedulingA: Appointments are made exclusively through WhatsApp, as I am deaf and communicate via messages. Simply send me a message to book your session.
text.preparationA: I recommend keeping the room calm and well-ventilated before my arrival to ensure a more relaxing experience.
text.arrivalA: I will arrive at the scheduled time, bringing everything necessary for the massage: a professional massage table, oils, and soothing music. You don't have to worry about anything!
text.initialConversationA: Before we begin, we will have a brief conversation to understand what you expect from the massage and what kind of touch you prefer, always focusing on your well-being.
text.massageA: I use techniques that promote deep relaxation, restore your energy, and create a sense of lightness and calm. The goal is to renew your body and mind, offering a unique sense of well-being.
text.closingA: After the massage, I will help you dress and give you a few simple tips to extend the positive effects of the session.
text.paymentA: Payment can be made in cash, by card, or via Google Pay. After the session, we say goodbye, and you can start your day refreshed and rejuvenated!

ABOUTME.title: About Me
ABOUTME.text: My name is Fahed, I am a Luso-Brazilian massage therapist of Lebanese descent. I have been a professional massage therapist since 2021 and completed my training in Portugal. I am passionate about massage and always strive to promote relaxation and well-being. I am an oralized deaf person, which makes me especially attentive to my clients' needs. I communicate clearly, understand some English, and am learning German to serve you even better. My priority is to offer a personalized service, making each session unique, relaxing, and tailored to your expectations. Treat yourself to an unforgettable well-being experience. Book your massage and recharge your energy today!

ATENCAO.text: Attention: The service is solely focused on well-being. I do not perform therapeutic massages, treatments, or procedures for pain relief.

text.question1: 1. What do I need to do to get a massage at my home?
text.question2: 2. How can I schedule an appointment?
text.question3: 3. I have pain or health problems. Can I get a massage?
text.communicationA: Choose a calm and comfortable environment with enough space for the massage table. Schedule an appointment at a suitable time so you can relax without any rush. No need to worry about materials – I bring everything. Wear comfortable clothing or underwear, or if you feel more comfortable, you can also remain undressed.
text.communicationB: Appointments are made exclusively via WhatsApp. Simply send me a message to arrange the time and place.
text.communicationC: My massages are for relaxation and well-being and are not intended for medical treatments. They are suitable for healthy individuals.
text.communicationD: Yes, you can pay by cash, card (VISA, Mastercard, etc.), or through Google Pay.
text.communicationE: I am available from Monday to Friday with flexible hours. Contact me via WhatsApp to schedule an appointment.
text.communicationF: Before the massage, let me know your preferences and needs, such as whether certain areas need special attention or if something should be avoided.
